text: was a Japanese poet. He won the international Hans Christian Andersen Medal in 1994 for his "lasting contribution to children's literature". Mado was born as Michio Ishida in Tokuyama, Yamaguchi prefecture. He died on February 28, 2014, aged 104. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mado dies Category:1909 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Children's writers Category:Japanese centenarians Category:Japanese poets Category:People from Yamaguchi Prefecture
